qa.name: Olivia
qa.essence: Nostalgic pianist with a hidden past

json_to_edit.voice_over: The melody lingered in the air, a bittersweet reminder of times long past.
json_to_edit.description: Olivia rediscovers an old piano in an antique shop, triggering memories of her youth.
json_to_edit.name: Forgotten Melody
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A forgotten melody reunites lost friends as Olivia plays a familiar tune in an antique shop.

qa.action: Exterior of the antique shop, with Olivia entering.

hf.action: Olivia wandering through the cluttered aisles of the antique shop.

tr.action: Olivia's eyes widening as she spots an old, dusty piano.

xc.action: Olivia gently wiping dust off the piano keys.

ka.action: Olivia's finger pressing a single key, testing the sound.

fn.action: Olivia sitting at the piano, beginning to play a haunting melody.

af.action: Tears welling up in Olivia's eyes as she plays.

qo.action: A figure entering the shop, drawn by the music.

fp.action: Olivia turning to see her long-lost friend standing in the doorway, both looking shocked and emotional.

edit_command: Add one more shot to the scene.
